programme.title: A Toast to Love
programme.desc: A marine archeologist finds wine in a shipwreck. If she hopes to save her research program she must discover the love story behind the wine.

programme.title: Heart of the Manor
programme.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, Real Estate agent Lisa Bentron finds herself in competition with handsome developer Matthew Wallace when he wants to buy her family's historic estate. But could he hold the key to Liz's heart?

programme.title: Christmas Cupcakes
programme.desc: With their family bakery facing foreclosure, two sisters must team-up to try and save it by entering a TV baking competition.

programme.title: An Hour Behind
programme.desc: When Trish Harper is late for a blind date due to Daylight Savings time, she mistakenly meets Parker, a thoughtful paramedic. But even though there's a spark between them, when she discovers her error she keeps him at arms-length, focusing instead on her thriving bakery. But ever so slowly, she begins to fall in love...

programme.title: Tails of Christmas
programme.desc: A military veteran searches for purpose in his life after an injury cut his career short. He finds it in a kind woman who runs an animal shelter. As they work together to find animals homes during the Christmas adoption season, they develop feelings for each other, and help each other with the challenges each faces.

programme.title: Santa’s Got Style
programme.desc: Madison Jacobs is a luxury department store executive who wants to think outside the box for this year’s holiday season. This year, she dreams up a Stylin’ Santa; who will showcase a perfectly tailored red designer suit. She calls up Ethan Davis, a retired model and current owner of a modelling agency. Ethan has been interested in Madison for quite some time. While struggling to find her the perfect model he resorts to modeling-under-cover as “Mr.S” himself.

programme.title: Surviving Love
programme.desc: Jessica Miller is a typical Millennial, graduating from college who must learn to navigate the real world. When her father presents her with a gift from her mother who died when she was 9, she must find the faith and courage to open the box, while trying to find her way in this difficult world. When she befriends a spiritual and vivacious African-American woman, suffering from dementia, she begins to understand the secrets to life and the courage to open a box of memories.

When her father presents her with a gift from her mother who died when she was 9, she must find the faith and courage to open the box, while trying to find her way in this difficult world. When she befriends a spiritual and vivacious African-American woman, suffering from dementia, she begins to understand the secrets to life and the courage to open a box of memories.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A young, flirtatious barista is bored with her social lifestyle and longs for real love. So when an eligible, handsome guy walks into her coffee shop, she turns on the charm, but he doesn’t respond to her flirting like men usually do. When she discovers that he runs a ministry that builds affordable housing, she decides to volunteer.
